changeSet.author: vanina
changeSet.comment: Added start date for empty cases in project table
changeSet.sql: update project set start_date = (select ifnull(l.listdate, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d')) from (select * from project) p left join listnms l on l.projectid = p.project_id where start_date is null and p.program_uuid is not null and study_type_id is not null and l.listtype = 'STUDY' and project.project_id = p.project_id);
